content: the jasmine star stitch is a beautiful reversible stitch that creates a dense fabric with stunning texture making it perfect for a small and simple jewelry dish or valet tray the pattern is available for free at 1dogwoof com and comes with a detailed step-by-step tutorial on crocheting the jasmine star stitch as well as instructions on finishing your valet tray **jasmine star stitch video tutorial** https //1dogwoof com/jasmine-star-stitch-video-crochet-tutorial/ 1 **jasmine star valet tray** https //1dogwoof com/jasmine-star-crochet-jewelry-dish-valet-tray/ 2 **finished size ** 4-5 square **yarn used in sample ** knit picks dishie 100% cotton 190 yds in 100g **suggested needles and notions ** size f / 3 75mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors **skills ** jasmine star stitch pattern is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof 1 https //1dogwoof com/jasmine-star-stitch-video-crochet-tutorial/ 2 https //1dogwoof com/jasmine-star-crochet-jewelry-dish-valet-tray/
